articles.title: ABC7 Chicago team tries Progresso Soup drops
articles.summary: ABC7 Chicago team tested Progresso Soup drops. The team had mixed reactions to the new product.

articles.title: Omnisient launches AI tool to bring ChatGPT-like simplicity to drawing answers from complex data
articles.summary: Omnisient has launched a new AI-powered feature that allows business leaders to analyze anonymized consumer data using natural language questions, similar to ChatGPT.  The new feature will debut at Microsoft's AI event on January 23, 2025, and operates through a secure chat-based interface hosted on Microsoft's Azure OpenAI.

articles.title: How Leapmotor plans to stand out from the crowd in Australia
articles.author: Jack Quick
articles.summary: Leapmotor has launched its C10 electric mid-size SUV in Australia, positioning it as a tech-heavy and accessible alternative to models like the Tesla Model Y. The company plans to introduce the C10 REEV and B10 small electric SUV in the near future, aiming to cover a significant portion of the Australian automotive market with up to six models in the next three years.

articles.title: J.Crew's Latest Drop Includes a Subtle Update to Its Most Iconic Shirt
articles.author: Brad Lanphear
articles.summary: J.Crew has introduced a westernized version of its popular Secret Wash shirt. The new Secret Wash Western Shirt features pearl snap button enclosures and comes in three colorways: solid white, light-blue gingham, and pink gingham.

articles.title: I tested nearly 50 of the best vacuum cleaners — here's the one I kept for myself
articles.author: Kristin Granero
articles.summary: Dyson launched the V12 Detect Slim Cordless Vacuum, a lightweight stick vacuum with features like an easy-release dust cup, HEPA filter, LCD screen, and a Fluffy Optic cleaner head. The vacuum has three modes and attachments. The review highlights its effectiveness on various surfaces and ease of use, making it suitable for regular home and car cleaning.

articles.title: This foundation is ‘ideal for my older skin' – and it's just £9.99
articles.author: Jane Cunningham
articles.summary: H&M launched its "perfect hydrating foundation," available in stores for £9.99. The foundation was tested for even coverage, ease of blend, hydration, and a natural look. The reviewer found a good match, 5N almond beige, and tested the product applying it to bare skin with light moisturizer.

articles.title: Here are the best robot vacuum deals right now
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: SwitchBot offers the S10, a do-it-all robot vacuum, providing a solution for task delegation to smart devices.

articles.title: BOULARD CALVADOS A new stunning design FOR 200 YEARS OF EXCELLENCE  Jan. 24, 2025 20:08
articles.summary: Calvados Boulard, celebrating its 200th anniversary, introduces new packaging that reinterprets its heritage with a modern design. The new packaging features gold and white branded square, a matt black neck reminiscent of frosted bottles, and refined color palettes. This redesign marks the brand's commitment to thrive for another 200 years.

articles.title: Amazon's best-selling vacuum described as a 'more reasonable Dyson' slashed to under £70
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Akitas' V8 Cordless Stick Vacuum, a 3-in-1 product, is highlighted as a best-selling item on Amazon, receiving positive reviews for its performance in picking up pet hair and its adequate battery life.  Customers emphasize the need for regular maintenance to ensure proper functioning.

articles.title: The ultimate Valentine's Day gift guide - National
articles.author: The Curator Team
articles.summary: This Valentine's Day, several companies are offering new product suggestions. Nintendo is featuring its Switch Lite, while YETI is highlighting its Rambler 26 oz Bottle. Dior is promoting its Sauvage scent, and Squishmallow presents its Llamacorn. There is also a mention of Apple AirTag being a good gift.

articles.title: Kia Syros debuts in Siliguri at Kaysons Kia
articles.author: Team Mp
articles.summary: Kaysons Kia launched the Kia Syros, a new SUV, in Siliguri, North Bengal, and Sikkim. The Syros features Level 2 ADAS, a 30-inch Trinity Panoramic Display, Kia Connect 2.0, and a segment-first rear seat slide, recline, and ventilation system. Pre-booking is available at Kaysons Kia with priority delivery for launch day bookings.

articles.title: Use This Secret Trick to Find Amazon Coupons Worth $100s
articles.author: Dana Schulz
articles.summary: Amazon launched a new mobile-only app called Amazon Haul, where most items are under $10 and additional discounts may apply for large orders. Amazon also has Amazon Premium Home section featuring "both indie and designer brands".

articles.title: OpenAI's Operator Is Here to Do the Clicking and Typing for You
articles.author: Samantha Kelly
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched 'Operator', a new AI agent designed to automate everyday tasks, interacting with web pages through typing, clicking, and scrolling within a special browser. Powered by the Computer-Using Agent model, it combines GPT-4o's vision capabilities with advanced reasoning. The tool is now available to paying Pro users in the US.

articles.title: Google's updates Performance Max to help advertisers drive better insights
articles.author: Technext
articles.summary: Google introduced new and advanced features to its Performance Max service. These updates aim to enhance the service for advertisers.

articles.title: Streamlining Grading For Pre-Owned Phone Wholesalers
articles.author: Sponsored Content
articles.summary: NSYS Autograding introduces an automated grading system for pre-owned phones.  The system uses AI and specialized imaging to grade devices objectively and quickly. This new system reduces human error, lowers operational costs, and improves accuracy in grading, resulting in higher customer satisfaction and increased profits.

articles.title: Meta's Threads Starts Showing Ads as It Hits 300 Million Active Users
articles.author: Trishla Ostwal
articles.summary: Meta is introducing ads on its Threads platform in the U.S. and Japan. A small group of advertisers will begin testing image ads in the Threads feed, and advertisers can extend existing Meta ad campaigns to Threads. Meta is also rolling out brand safety and suitability controls for Threads.

articles.title: Origin Hybrid Pro Mattress review: impressively priced, considerably sized and serenely comfortable
articles.author: James Hunt
articles.summary: Origin has launched the 'new and improved' Origin Hybrid Pro Mattress. This multi-award winning mattress aims to provide luxury and comfort at a lower price, featuring eight comfort layers and bamboo-infused wool. Testing showed improved sleep quality, and the Hybrid Pro is available exclusively on Origin's website with free next-day delivery and a 200-night trial.

articles.title: Gadgets Now Awards 2024 jury meets to decide the best gadgets of the year
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: The Gadgets Now Awards 2024 showcased innovations in the digital device landscape. Key products like the Apple iPhone 16 Pro, Google Pixel 9 Pro XL, and Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra competed in the 'Best Smartphone' category, while Asus, HP, and Samsung presented emerging AI-powered gadgets.

articles.title: OpenAI's new ChatGPT agent can perform interactive tasks on your behalf
articles.author: Lance Whitney
articles.summary: OpenAI has released a research preview of its new AI service, Operator, which is designed to independently carry out user commands on the web. Currently accessible to ChatGPT Pro subscribers in the US at $200 per month, Operator interacts directly with a web browser to navigate web pages, type, scroll, and click, aiming to automate tasks without user intervention. OpenAI plans to expand Operator's accessibility to Plus, Team, and Enterprise users, eventually integrating its skills directly into ChatGPT.

articles.title: Best Samsung Galaxy S25 deals: $300 gift cards and free offers at AT&T and Verizon
articles.author: Allison Murray
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the Galaxy S25 series, including the Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, featuring a Snapdragon Elite 8 chipset and enhanced Galaxy AI. Preorders are open, with the phones officially going on sale on February 7, and deals are available through Samsung, Verizon, AT&T, and T-Mobile.

articles.title: Samsung's "Now Brief" is a feature so useful it may win over even the biggest AI skeptics
articles.author: Claire Tabari
articles.summary: Samsung is launching "Now Brief", an AI-powered feature exclusive to the Samsung Galaxy S25 phones. This feature uses Galaxy AI to provide daily briefings, compiling personal data from other Galaxy applications to inform users about weather, sleep, scheduled events, and more through Morning, Midday, and Evening briefs. The feature will be accessible via a home screen widget and lock screen.

articles.title: What's poppin'? Fizz N Sip 'dirty soda' shop opening in Overlook neighborhood
articles.summary: Veronika Sakhashchik is launching Fizz N Sip, a new soda shop in North Portland, offering a variety of "dirty" soda concoctions with flavored syrups and creams. The shop features a menu of premade drinks and customization options with a soft launch scheduled for February 8th.

articles.title: What's poppin'? Fizz N Sip 'dirty soda' shop opening in Overlook neighborhood
articles.author: Hannah Seibold
articles.summary: Sonic and Taco Bell are selling variations of their slushes and freezes, calling them "dirty soda" drinks. These concoctions involve flavored syrups and creams.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series Sets New Standard of AI Phone as a True AI Companion
articles.author: Sponsored
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the Galaxy S25 Ultra, S25+, and S25, highlighting their AI capabilities and the Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform. The Galaxy S25 series introduces multimodal AI agents, enhanced camera features, and a durable design with Corning GorillaArmor2. The Galaxy S25 series is available to order.

articles.title: See the New 2026 Tesla Model Y 'Juniper' From Every Angle
articles.author: Emmet White
articles.summary: Tesla launched an updated Model Y for the U.S. market. This long-range, all-wheel-drive Launch Series form has a starting price of $59,990.

articles.title: Samsung Unpacked 2025: S25 Leaks, AR Glasses & More
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 series, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, featuring a sleek design, new color options, and the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset. The series introduces software enhancements like 10-bit HDR recording, Galaxy Virtual Aperture, and ProScaler, with the base Galaxy S25 model starting at $799.

articles.title: Voodoo Ranger Juice Force IPA is a real problem (in a good way!)
articles.author: Christian D'Andrea
articles.summary: New Belgium has launched Voodoo Ranger Juice Force IPA, a hazy pale ale with 9.5% ABV, marketed as part of a summer 2024 promotion. The beer is described as having a strong citrus flavor and is available in a 19.2-ounce can, targeting consumers seeking a high-alcohol beverage that tastes like a cocktail.

articles.title: Bigger is not always better: The Samsung S25 Ultra is slightly smaller but more powerful than its predecessor
articles.author: Dinna Chan Vasquez
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 series, featuring enhancements like the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy, improved vapor chamber for better gaming performance, stronger build with Corning Gorilla Armor 2, and upgraded cameras including a 200MP wide lens on the S25 Ultra. The series, including the S25 Ultra, S25+, and S25, will be available in various colors, with prices starting at P84,990, P67,990, and P51,990 respectively for the 256GB models and pre-order offers include double storage and discounts on Samsung Care.

articles.title: Aldi launches ‘first-of-its-kind' steak range
articles.author: Food
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a new 'first-of-its-kind' steak range called 'Specially Selected 40-Day Matured Angus Steaks,' with prices starting from £4.49. The range includes Rump, Sirloin, and Ribeye cuts, all made with Aberdeen Angus Beef aged for 40 days. The new steak range is available in-store and online.

articles.title: [Latest!] iToolab AnyGo: Best in 2025 Pokemon GO Spoofer
articles.author: Itoolab Co Ltd
articles.summary: iToolab launched AnyGo, a product designed for Pokémon GO players. AnyGo allows players to explore new places within the game virtually, overcoming real-world limitations. It is available for various platforms and offers features like simulating movement and customizing routes.

articles.title: 10 Industries Setting the Standard for Exceptional Customer Service in 2025
articles.author: Liz Flynn
articles.summary: Industries are using AI and technology to innovate customer service. For instance, Bety, a casino and betting crypto platform, is offering 24/7 support and personalized interfaces using AI-based tools. Various industries are adopting AI and automation to enhance efficiency and accuracy.

articles.title: New Day Car Wash opening another metro location
articles.author: Marie Leech
articles.summary: New Day Car Wash, a subsidiary of LIV Ventures, is opening a new location at 5961 Chalkville Mountain Road in Trussville with a ribbon-cutting ceremony scheduled for Feb. 21. This new location is part of a larger expansion plan that includes other locations in Fultondale, Vestavia Hills, and potentially Tuscaloosa.

articles.title: Why sustainability will set your business apart
articles.author: Mancunian Matters staff
articles.summary: Cress facilitates the buying and selling of preloved children's clothing. Beyond Meat offers plant-based burgers as an alternative to traditional meat production. DeakinBio produces bio-based ceramic tiles with a significantly reduced carbon footprint compared to conventional tiles. Patagonia commits to repairing worn clothing to promote sustainability.

articles.title: Should Your Next Laptop Be an AI PC?
articles.author: Nicholas De Leon
articles.summary: New AI PCs equipped with NPUs from AMD and Intel are emerging, enhancing applications like Microsoft Paint with generative fill and XSplit's VCam for background removal. Samsung plans to use natural language processing on its devices. VLC will add live subtitling feature using NPU or GPU.

articles.title: Edgecore Networks to Showcase High-Performance Open Infrastructure Solutions at Mobile World Congress 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Edgecore Networks is set to showcase its Open Infrastructure solutions at MWC 2025, which includes solutions for AI applications with high-performance and low latency, Next-Generation Telecom Access and Aggregation routers optimized for 5G edge, and scalable enterprise infrastructure for wired and wireless campus networks. These solutions are designed for Telecom Operators, Service Providers and large Enterprises worldwide.

articles.title: Edible crickets now sold at Sheng Shiong, but some S'poreans are shocked at the price Singapore News
articles.summary: Insectyumz launched its Tom Yum-flavored edible crickets in all 75 Sheng Siong branches, making them available for purchase in the snack section. The company, Singapore's first and biggest brand of insect food, aims to introduce more insect-based food options, including silkworms, locusts, white grubs, and honeybees.

articles.title: NovaUCD AI Accelerator taking applications
articles.author: Ciarán Mather
articles.summary: NovaUCD announced the launch of its 2025 AI Ecosystem Accelerator Programme, which seeks applications from Irish start-ups developing disruptive AI solutions. The six-month program offers guidance, workshops, co-working space, and networking opportunities to accelerate AI start-ups from ideation to the investment stage.

articles.title: State govt. to help KSDL set up unit in Vijayapura
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Limited (KSDL) is planning to set up a soaps and detergent factory in Vijayapura. KSDL also introduced 21 new products recently, including shower gels, glycerin-based transparent bar, and cosmetics, targeting the younger generation.

articles.title: Superdrug has perfume deal for customers to get any available for £8
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: Superdrug is offering a promotional deal where customers can purchase a Perfume Pod Ice Atomiser for £7.99 and have it filled with a fragrance sample in-store.  The refillable 5ml pods are intended for travel or on-the-go use, allowing customers to try different scents before buying a full-sized bottle.

articles.title: Samsung's thin, big, boring AI phones
articles.author: David Pierce
articles.summary: Samsung launched its Galaxy S25 series, including the S25 Edge, S25, S25 Plus and the S25 Ultra. The company also provided a glimpse of its first Android XR headset, Project Moohan.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans scrambling to buy new Dr Marten dupes in two colours – and they're €182 cheaper
articles.author: Isabela Boechat
articles.summary: Aldi Ireland has launched new 'Dr Martens dupes' called the Avenue Ladies' Boots, priced at €17.99 and available in two colors. Additionally, the Visage Ionic Hair Dryer, a dupe for the Dyson Supersonic, will be available on January 26 for €16.99, offering multiple heat and speed settings.

articles.title: Just Salad Launches "Salad AI" Recipe Generator to Revolutionize Personalized Dining Experience
articles.author: Just Salad
articles.summary: Just Salad launched "Salad AI," a personalization tool designed to transform how customers discover and enjoy their perfect meal. The AI provides mobile app users with tailored ordering recommendations based on personalized survey results, matching their culinary preferences.

articles.title: Superdrug shoppers can get any perfume for £8 in 'little known' offer
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: Superdrug is offering customers a new in-store promotion where they can purchase a £7.99 Perfume Pod Ice Atomiser and fill it once with any available perfume tester. This service allows customers to sample premium fragrances or acquire travel-sized perfume options.

articles.title: 'Little known' way Superdrug customers can get perfume of their choice for £7.99
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: Superdrug is offering customers a promotion where they can purchase a £7.99 Perfume Pod Ice Atomiser and have it filled with a perfume sample of their choice in-store. The pod holds 5ml of liquid, providing approximately 65 sprays. This deal allows customers to try out perfumes without purchasing a full-sized bottle.

articles.title: Superdrug customers can get any perfume for £8 in 'little known' offer
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: Superdrug is offering customers a chance to sample fragrances with the purchase of a £7.99 Perfume Pod Ice Atomiser, which staff will fill with a complimentary sample from available perfume testers. This allows customers to try perfumes before committing to a full bottle purchase.

articles.title: News of the Week: Random Notes, Ernie Kovacs, and You Can Finally Eat Soup in Cough Drop Form
articles.author: Bob Sassone
articles.summary: Progresso has launched a new product called Soup Drops, which are cough drop-sized drops with the flavor of chicken noodle soup. Each order comes with a can of Progresso's chicken noodle soup. The soup drops will only be available for a limited time.

articles.title: Tuft & Needle Original Hybrid mattress review: A very comfortable, breathable, and responsive mid-range bed
articles.author: Alex Temblador
articles.summary: Tuft & Needle launched the Original Hybrid Mattress, featuring T&N Flex Foam for breathability and responsiveness. The mattress is designed with four layers, including T&N Release foam for pressure relief and Adaptive foam for temperature control. The Original Hybrid Mattress offers excellent motion isolation and temperature regulation, suitable for various sleep positions, particularly back and side sleepers.

articles.title: LG ACQUIRES MAJORITY STAKE IN BEAR ROBOTICS TO BOLSTER ROBOTICS CAPABILITIES
articles.author: LG Electronics USA
articles.summary: LG is making a strategic investment to accelerate innovation. This investment focuses on LG's commercial, home, and industrial robot solutions.

articles.title: Louie's Original, grilling fancy burgers in Potrero Hill
articles.author: Maria C. Ascarrunz
articles.summary: Louie's Original opened in October 2024 and offers a variety of burgers, including the Big Sister burger and the Louie Original, which comes in Little Louie and Big Louie versions. The restaurant also serves waffle fries, onion rings, chicken tenders, and milkshakes, alongside craft beer and wine.

articles.title: Samsung QN90D Neo QLED review: That one TV you'd want in your living room
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the QN90D Neo QLED TV, featuring Mini LED technology, NQ4 AI Gen2 processor, and a 4.2.2 channel 60W speaker system with OTS+. The TV includes gaming features like 144Hz refresh rates and Game Bar 4.0, and runs on Samsung's Tizen OS. The 55-inch model is priced at Rs 151,990.

articles.title: Human AI, Jadrolita Unveiled as Samsungs Physical Robot
articles.author: Tori
articles.summary: Jadrolita unveiled herself as Samsung's physical robot on Instagram. Samsung introduced a new product, a physical robot.

articles.title: Keep your gaming beverages cool with the Xbox Series X mini fridge, now massively discounted ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Currys has reduced the price of the Xbox Series X mini fridge. The Xbox Series X mini fridge is a product of Microsoft.

articles.title: Uber Eats announced a new partnership with Wegmans
org: United Food and Commercial Workers International Union
articles.summary: Ahold Delhaize launched Alfa Beta's new customer app designed for a seamless online shopping experience. Uber Eats partnered with Wegmans Food Markets, Inc. to expand grocery delivery, allowing users to order groceries through the Uber Eats app. Walmart unveiled new innovation pilots with India-based startups to enhance its supply chain resilience. METRO is expanding its delivery service in Spain with a new multi-temperature depot.

articles.title: Human AI, Jadrolita Unveiled as Samsung's Physical Robot
articles.author: Thandiubani
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled Jadrolita, a Nigerian AI, as their physical robot during the Samsung Galaxy AI launch on January 22nd, 2024. Jadrolita celebrated her role in the 'Samsung Galaxy Unpacked' event, marking a fusion of technology and excitement. This represents the introduction of a new service incorporating AI.

articles.title: OpenAI's Operator is your new autonomous AI assistant ready to do your biding across the web
articles.author: Jeremy Laird
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched Operator, an AI agent designed to translate text prompts into real-world tasks via the internet. Currently, Operator is available as a research preview for ChatGPT Pro subscribers and is based on OpenAI's Computer-Using Agent (CUA) model, collaborating with companies like DoorDash, Instacart, OpenTable, Priceline, StubHub, Thumbtack, and Uber.

articles.title: Tesla Unveils the Revamped Model Y
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Tesla launched a redesigned Model Y, initially in China, now available in the U.S., Canada, and Europe, priced at $59,990 as a 'Launch Series' in the U.S. The Model Y features an enhanced range of 320 miles and incorporates Tesla's Full Self-Driving system.

articles.title: The Meta Ray-Ban Glasses
articles.author: Mickey Mellen
articles.summary: Meta has released the Meta Ray-Ban Smart Glasses, equipped with a camera for photos and videos, AI for questions and language translation, and directional speakers for audio. The glasses have a starting price of $299 for the frames and charge in their case.

articles.title: The Indo Daily: The real winners and losers in the Prince Harry lawsuit?
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: BoxedBliss, a beauty and wellness subscription box company, emphasizes personalized experiences tailored to customer interests. CEO Sarah Evans highlights the importance of handpicking high-quality items relevant to subscribers' passions, fostering community engagement through social media and personalized recommendations. BoxedBliss is looking to incorporate AI and augmented reality to enrich user experiences.

articles.title: Amazon slashes price of Samsung Galaxy S25 just days after launch
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 series, including the S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra, with enhancements over the S24. Amazon is offering the S25 at a discounted price of £859, and bundles including the Galaxy Buds3 Pro and Galaxy Watch 7 are available. Mobiles.co.uk provides free storage upgrades, while iD Mobile and Sky offer contract deals.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers snap up 'genius' £10 gadget that makes clothes 'look brand new'
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: Amazon shoppers are buying a fabric shaver to remove lint and fuzz from clothes. Customers praise the product's effectiveness in making old clothes look new and extending their lifespan. The fabric shaver is available on Amazon.

articles.title: 5 Best Samsung Flagship HPs in Early 2025, Check the Prices!
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is launching several flagship phones, including the Galaxy Z Fold6, Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy S24 Ultra, Galaxy Z Fold5 and the Galaxy Z Flip6. These phones include advancements in display technology, camera capabilities and powerful performance. The Galaxy Z Fold6 has an AI foldable design, the Galaxy S25 Ultra boasts a 200MP camera, and the Z Flip6 offers a blend of portability and advanced features.

articles.title: OpenAI's Operator is a step towards the world of web agents
articles.author: Megan Morrone
articles.summary: OpenAI has released Operator, a research preview of its first AI agent, designed to automate web tasks for users. Operator can fill out forms, order products, and make reservations by operating its own browser. OpenAI views Operator as the first step in expanding AI capabilities beyond ChatGPT.

articles.title: Taco Bell launches first limited-time menu item of 2025
articles.author: Taco Bell
articles.summary: Taco Bell launched Cheesy Dipping Burritos in January 2025, available at participating US locations. Prior to that, Taco Bell had launched Crispy Chicken Nuggets in December 2024, after successful tests in Minnesota and Texas.

articles.title: Redefining Car Accessories Market: Drivestylish is Setting New Standards
articles.author: Team Asianet Newsable
articles.summary: Drivestylish, launched in 2022, is offering delivery and installation of car accessories at affordable rates. The company distinguishes itself by providing high-quality products, post-delivery assistance, and a focus on sustainability with eco-friendly product options.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Galaxy S25 Series
articles.author: Abolaji Adebayo
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched the Galaxy S25 series, including the S25 Ultra, S25+, and S25 models. These phones feature a customized Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform for Galaxy and One UI 7, providing personalized AI experiences. The series aims to change user interaction with their phones through multimodal AI agents.

articles.title: Redmi Note 14 series launches in Nigeria: A grand showcase of innovation
articles.author: Premium Times
articles.summary: Redmi launched the Redmi Note 14 series in Nigeria. The launch event featured impressive setups and decorations and was attended by tech influencers.

articles.title: Kidmoto Launches Moto Nation Furthering National Expansion
articles.summary: Moto Nation, the parent company for Kidmoto, Babymoto, and Busmoto, has launched a network of specialized mobility services. Kidmoto provides safe airport transportation with pre-installed car seats, Babymoto specializes in secure newborn transportation, and Busmoto caters to transporting airline and cruise crews. Moto Nation plans to expand its services to 20 additional cities.

articles.title: Nykaa incorporates new Oman subsidiary in Middle Eastern push
articles.author: ETtech
articles.summary: Nykaa has incorporated a new wholly-owned subsidiary, Nysaa Cosmetics SPC, in Oman. This new entity will focus on the sale and trade of beauty and personal care products across online and offline channels. Nykaa's subsidiary Nessa International will own 100% stake in the newly floated company.

articles.title: Samsung unveils Galaxy S25 phones with powerful AI features
articles.author: Faizel Patel
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its Galaxy S25 series, featuring the base S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra models. These phones include AI features like audio eraser, cooking master, and Google's Gemini AI, with the S25 series price starting at R19,999 and are available for pre-order with general availability by February 7, 2025.

articles.title: Tesla launches new Model Y in US, Canada, Europe weeks after China
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Tesla has launched a new, higher-priced version of its Model Y in the United States, Canada, and Europe, following its initial release in China. The new long-range all-wheel-drive Model Y variant is priced at $59,990 and includes supervised full self-driving software. Tesla will begin delivering the new cars in March.

articles.title: Decentralized Privacy-Centric Search Engine Presearch Launches New ‘NSFW' Spicy Mode
articles.summary: Presearch has launched a new 'Spicy' NSFW feature as part of its Presearch Takeover Advertising (PTA) service, designed for adult users seeking 'after hours' content. This new feature introduces a safe space for adult products, services, and creators, offering privacy-focused search and ethical advertising. It includes adult-oriented ads, curated content, and a dedicated OnlyFans search feature, catering to industry leaders like Lovense and OnlyFans.

articles.title: How U.K. retailer Currys is working with Accenture, Microsoft and Avanade to deliver better in-store customer experience
articles.author: Andrew Busby
articles.summary: Currys is introducing a digital queuing system fronted by 'Sales Floor Leaders' to improve the in-store experience, along with electronic shelf edge labeling in 100 U.K. and Ireland stores by April 2025. Currys is also trialing generative AI opportunities in stores to provide customers and colleagues with tools and data to enhance customer service and aftersales journeys.

articles.title: Google rolls out several new PMax updates following successful beta launches
articles.summary: Google is integrating its AI into advertisers' campaigns with new tools. These tools aim to enhance brand safety, deepen search capabilities, and improve customer segmentation for advertisers using Google's services.

articles.title: Tesla's new Model Y arrives in the US
articles.author: Mariella Moon
articles.summary: Tesla launched the redesigned Model Y in North America and Europe, offering a long-range all-wheel-drive launch series variant starting at $46,490. The new Model Y features redesigned lights, ambient lighting, ventilated seats, a 15.4-inch touchscreen, and an 8-inch rearscreen display, boasting an estimated range of 325 miles and acceleration from 0 to 60 mph in 4.1 seconds.

articles.title: Kmart buyers discover an essential cooking article of $ 10: 'Take my money!'
articles.author: Belinda Cleary
articles.summary: Kmart introduces a $10 drying carpet designed to absorb moisture from freshly washed dishes and utensils.  The drying carpet is made of diatomeaus land, which helps in rapid water evaporation. Some customers are also using larger bathroom carpets in the kitchen.

articles.title: OpenAI's Operator Lets ChatGPT Use the Web for You
articles.author: Will Knight
articles.summary: OpenAI is testing Operator, a new ChatGPT feature that uses AI to operate a web browser for online tasks. This AI agent interprets commands and automates tasks such as booking trips and buying groceries, potentially increasing productivity.

articles.title: BYD shows off its trick suspension tech with an unusual challenge
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: BYD demonstrated its new luxury sedan's ability to electronically control its suspension, featuring it playing a game on its roof.

articles.title: ChatGPT Can Now Surf the Web and Order Products for You
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched Operator, a new AI agent that interacts with the web to execute tasks. Operator combines GPT-4 with a Computer-Using Agent model, enabling it to browse websites, fill out forms, and complete actions. It is currently available as a research preview for ChatGPT Pro users in the United States.

articles.title: Agentic AI: Opportunities for Indian tech
articles.author: Debjani Ghosh
articles.summary: The article highlights the rise of 'Service as Software' driven by Agentic AI, where software delivers autonomous, outcome-driven services. Companies like TCS, Infosys, Wipro, LTIMindtree, Mphasis, and Persistent Systems are integrating AI technologies. Indian SaaS firms are also developing vertical-specific AI solutions to enhance their platforms and deliver differentiated, autonomous outcomes.

articles.title: Trump Pulls the Military Back Into the Political and Culture Wars - T…
articles.summary: An apparel company is launching a new line of high-end baby clothes. To promote the new product, they are working with an agency to create profiles of wealthy young parents for targeted advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: Foxys Kitchen Founders Unveil Premium Kitchenware Brand ‘Meh Baba'
articles.summary: Foxys Kitchen founders, Vikum Jayasekera and Nadeeshani Jayasinghe, launched 'Meh Baba', a premium kitchenware brand. The brand's initial product is a premium stainless steel knife designed to enhance the cooking experience and available for purchase at mehbaba.com. Meh Baba plans to release a series of high-quality kitchenware items throughout the year.

articles.title: Tesla's 2025 Model Y launches in US: Check price, features
articles.summary: Tesla has introduced its latest Model Y Long Range all-wheel drive (AWD) version, called "Launch Series," to the US market after its Chinese debut. The EV is available for pre-order and is priced at $59,990, excluding destination charges and taxes.

articles.title: Salon Bouje brings press-on nails to ‘The Block'
articles.author: Brian Wynter Gleaner Writer
articles.summary: Salon Bouje introduced its Gloss Balm, a lip balm and lip gloss all-in-one product, at a pop-up shop. The pop-up also showcased Salon Bouje's best-selling press-on nails, offering a quick and easy application.

articles.title: 44 Products That'll Make The Little Things In Life Easier In 2025
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Several companies are launching new products, including Catrice's "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, Buddeez's "Bread Buddy" dispenser, and Better Life's all-natural tile and tub cleaner. Curlinator Designs is offering a 2-in-1 hair bun maker, while Click & Carry provides a grocery bag carrier. Brighttia features gold cable organizers, Covogoods is introducing CovoBox for hiding Wi-Fi routers, and Shower Cat specializes in products to prevent shower clogs. SwitchBot launched Smart Switch Button Pusher. OXO released a diaper wipes dispenser.

articles.title: The £38 little black dress from Next fans say is 'flattering' and 'skims over lumps and bumps'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Next is offering the 'Black Long Sleeve Zip Front Mini Dress,' which the brand claims is versatile enough for both office and evening wear. Available in black, sizes 8-24, and primarily made of polyester, the dress has received positive reviews from shoppers, praising its flattering fit and comfort. One shopper, however, cited the price as somewhat expensive.

articles.title: Glow Naturally With Vytle's Ultra-Gentle, Deeply Moisturising Skincare For Every Skin Type
articles.author: Khirthnadhevi Kumar
articles.summary: Suu Balm introduced Vytle, a dermatologist-formulated skincare line designed for the entire family. Vytle products promise a significant increase in skin moisture after initial use. The new line aims to nourish, restore, and deeply moisturize skin.

articles.title: How do the Galaxy S25 Ultra and S24 Ultra stack up to one another
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Samsung's S25 Ultra is being evaluated as a successor to last year's model, representing the company's top-tier smartphone offering. The evaluation determines if the new model is a worthy upgrade.

articles.title: Tesla brings its redesigned Model Y to the US, but keeps selling the old one too
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Tesla is launching its redesigned Model Y in the United States. The company will also continue to sell the older version of the Model Y.

articles.title: When fledgling Chinese brand Leapmotor's next SUV is coming to Australia
articles.author: Jack Quick
articles.summary: Leapmotor launched its C10 mid-size electric SUV, rivaling Tesla Model Y, in the Australian market. The company's focus is already shifting to future products.

articles.title: Botika: $8 Million (Seed) Secured For AI-Generated Fashion Model Platform
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Botika launched its new mobile iOS app, designed to empower online clothing companies, and closed an $8 million seed funding round. The app, along with advancements to Botika's Generative AI Platform, aims to redefine how fashion brands create high-quality, on-model images for e-commerce, offering an accessible and cost-effective solution to enhance visual content and improve sales.

articles.title: Tesla launches new Model Y in US, Canada, Europe weeks after China
articles.author: Hong Kong Standard
articles.summary: Tesla launched a new higher-priced long-range all-wheel drive version of its best-selling Model Y car in the United States, Canada, and Europe. This launch follows the initial release of the new Model Y in China a few weeks prior.

articles.title: Best meal delivery services in Australia ranked: Find the best option for you
articles.summary: YouFoodz offers a rotating menu of over 40 meals weekly and delivers them ready to heat in minutes, also sold at select supermarkets. ChefGood provides over 50 weekly dietitian-designed meal options tailored for various lifestyles. MACROS provides macro-optimized meals and options for various lifestyles and ships with no-lock-in contracts. A Life Plus delivers fresh, handcrafted meals tailored to dietary needs, including keto and gluten-free options.

articles.title: Best meal delivery services in Australia ranked: Find the best option for you
articles.author: Miranda Aitken
articles.summary: YouFoodz, ChefGood, MACROS, and A Life Plus are pre-packaged meal delivery services catering to various dietary needs and lifestyles. YouFoodz focuses on convenience and affordability, ChefGood supports health and wellness goals, MACROS targets fitness enthusiasts with macro-optimized meals, and A Life Plus specializes in nutritional support for individuals in recovery. These services offer flexible subscriptions and aim to simplify meal routines for busy individuals while prioritizing health and taste.

articles.title: How To Become A Lazada Affiliate & Earn Some Money?
articles.author: Press Releases
articles.summary: Lazada has launched LazAffiliates Malaysia, an affiliate program that enables individuals to earn commissions by promoting Lazada products. Users can register via their Lazada account, participate in affiliate events, track their progress through a dedicated dashboard, and maximize earnings by leveraging seasonal campaigns and creating engaging content.

articles.title: Boolvideo 2.0: Transform Static Image into Dynamic Video
articles.summary: Boolv Tech has launched Boolvideo 2.0, an AI-powered video creation upgrade that helps businesses create promotional content for e-commerce. Boolvideo 2.0 transforms static product images into dynamic, high-quality videos using features like AI Image Dynamization. The platform also allows users to transform product URLs and ideas into engaging, platform-specific videos optimized for TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, and more.

articles.title: Open collaboration without sacrificing privacy forms Samsung's mobile AI strategy
articles.author: Mathures Paul
articles.summary: Samsung launched its flagship Galaxy S25 series, featuring Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra models, powered by AI and running on a customized Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform. The phones are available for pre-order and come in various configurations and exclusive colors through Samsung.com.

articles.title: BYD Yangwang U8 is an ultra-premium SUV, Check what its all about
articles.summary: BYD introduced its premium Yangwang U8 SUV at the Auto Expo 2025 in India. The Yangwang U8 features gloss black alloy wheels, LED tail lamps with a honeycomb pattern, and a chrome grille. The SUV incorporates silver accents and a premium tan interior finish.

articles.title: UnitedHealth promotes Medicare chief to fill slain leader's job
articles.summary: OpenAI launched Operator, an AI agent capable of performing tasks on the internet autonomously. CNN previewed a new streaming service, similar to its TV product, and announced a new subscription product around 'lifestyle' content, financed by a $70 million investment from Warner Bros. Discovery.

articles.title: Council Post: 5 Lessons From A Magician About Captivating Teams And Customers
articles.summary: Apple's product launches are highlighted for their ability to create excitement. Netflix transitioned from DVD rentals to a streaming service adapting to consumer behavior. Amazon anticipates consumer needs by providing personalized recommendations. Johnson & Johnson responded to the Tylenol crisis by pulling products and introducing tamper-proof packaging.

articles.title: New Chance Care celebrates grand opening in Sylacauga with ribbon-cutting ceremony
articles.author: Sylacauga News
articles.summary: The Sylacauga Chamber of Commerce celebrated the grand opening of New Chance Care. This signifies the launch of a new care service in Sylacauga.

articles.title: Meta to test ads on Threads in US and Japan
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Meta Platforms is test launching ads on its Threads platform in the U.S. and Japan. This launch follows Meta's content moderation makeover and seeks to capitalize on the volatility at TikTok by offering brands an alternative advertising venue.

articles.title: Tesla's updated Model Y is now available to order in the US and Europe
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Tesla's updated Model Y is now available for order in the US, Canada, UK, and mainland Europe. This refreshed Model Y was initially launched in China. The new Tesla Model Y is also for sale in the US, UK, and Europe.

articles.title: Natural Grocers adds pastas and sauces
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A company launched six pastas and five sauces. The launch introduces a variety of new pasta and sauce products.

articles.title: Artlogo Launches Artlogo PRO Bundle to Redefine Branding Solutions
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Artlogo launched the Artlogo PRO Bundle, an innovative service designed to streamline personal and professional branding efforts. This bundle provides professionals across industries with a solution for enhancing their digital presence.

articles.title: Krispy Kreme is trying out a menu with 9 new doughnuts. Raleigh is a test market
articles.author: The Herald-Sun
articles.summary: Krispy Kreme is testing nine new donut flavors at its Triangle locations. This represents an introduction of new product offerings for the company.

articles.title: Aldi opening new St. Louis-area store
articles.author: Business Journal
articles.summary: Aldi is expanding its presence by opening a new store in Olivette, St. Louis area. This initiative broadens Aldi's service reach within the region, providing customers with increased access to their products.

articles.title: Noise ColorFit Pro 6 Smartwatch Launched In India: Price, Features
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Noise has launched a new series of affordable smartwatches. The Max variant of the smartwatch supports AI features and GPS.

articles.title: Be the first in line for a Nintendo Switch 2 pre-order with an increasing number ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo is potentially launching a new product, the Nintendo Switch 2. The article provides information on how to register interest for a pre-order of this upcoming console.
